output_list.reason: The mintToken function does not have a check on the mintedAmount parameter, allowing an overflow of the total supply.
The _transfer function does not check if the target address is a smart contract, allowing a locked token to be transferred to a smart contract.
The burnFrom function does not check if the allowance is sufficient, allowing a user to burn more tokens than an allowed.
The transferFrom function does not check if the target address is a smart contract, allowing a locked token to be transferred to a smart contract.
The transfer function does not check if the target address is a smart contract, allowing a locked token to be transferred to a smart contract.
